filter.name: Frame Set A
filter.config: <frame><config><pdus><pdu name="eth1" pdu="ethernet:EthernetII"><dstMac filterMinValue="@MAC1@" filterMaxValue="@MAC1@">@MASK_MAC1@</dstMac><vlans name="anon_2294"><Vlan name="Vlan"><pri filterMinValue="@SPbits1@" filterMaxValue="@SPbits1@">111</pri><id filterMinValue="@SVID1@" filterMaxValue="@SVID1@">4095</id></Vlan></vlans></pdu></pdus></config></frame>
